Helpmann Award for

Location Australia

Currently held by

Isaac Hayward

Muriel's Wedding Musical (2018)
Website HelpmannAwards.com.au

The Helpmann Award for Best Musical is a musical theatre award, presented by Live Performance Australia (LPA) at the annual Helpmann Awards since 2001.[1] The award is for a production in Australia, and is open to both new musicals and revivals. This is a list of winners and nominations for the Helpmann Award for Best Musical.
